meanings.definition: A person who commits bigamy by marrying more than one spouse.
meanings.sent1: The bigamist was caught when both of his wives showed up at the same event.
meanings.sent2: The police arrested the bigamist for having two legal marriages at once.
meanings.sent3: The bigamist's attempt to juggle two marriages ended in a comical mix-up.
meanings.sent4: Being a bigamist is like trying to balance two fragile glass balls at the same time.
meanings.sent5: The bigamist's double life eventually unraveled, causing chaos in both families.
